# room_info

获取各直播平台房间信息

## Installation

可以通过本命令安装 room_info:

```bash
npm install room_info --save
```

## Simple uses

```javascript
const room_info = require('room_info')

const test_douyu = async () => {
    let info = await room_info('douyu', '321370')
    console.log('douyu', '321370', info)
}

const test_panda = async () => {
    let info = await room_info('panda', '6666')
    console.log('panda', '6666', info)
}

const test_xingyan = async () => {
    let info = await room_info('xingyan', '100046')
    console.log('xingyan', '100046', info)
}

const test_huya = async () => {
    let info = await room_info('huya', 'edc595')
    console.log('huya', 'edc595', info)
}

const test_longzhu = async () => {
    let info = await room_info('longzhu', 'xuxubaobao')
    console.log('longzhu', 'xuxubaobao', info)
}

const test_quanmin = async () => {
    let info = await room_info('quanmin', '1980174')
    console.log('quanmin', '1980174', info)
}

const test_huoshan = async () => {
    let info = await room_info('huoshan', '132887155')
    console.log('huoshan', '132887155', info)
}

test_douyu()
test_panda()
test_xingyan()
test_huya()
test_longzhu()
test_quanmin()
test_huoshan()
```
